description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Lime Brulee recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coconut Lime Brulee Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 150°C. Line the base of a roasting pan with a folded tea towel. Sit four 1/2 cupcapacity ovenproof ramekins in the pan.
Place cream, coconut milk and lime rind in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes until mixture just comes to the boil. Remove from heat.
Whisk egg yolks and caster sugar together in a bowl until pale and thick. Slowly add the hot cream mixture, whisking constantly. Strain and divide evenly among ramekins.

Place roasting pan on oven rack. Pour enough boiling water into the pan to reach halfway up the sides of the ramekins. Bake for 1 hour or until just set. Remove pan from oven and carefully lift ramekins out of the pan. Cool for 20 minutes then refrigerate overnight or until cold.
Preheat grill on high. Sprinkle brulees with demerara sugar. Cook under grill, about 6cm from heat source, for 23 minutes or until sugar bubbles and caramelises. Serve.
